resources.string: This quiz was designed to check your knowledge in some fields of Differential Calculus
lim[(e^x-1)/sinx]what is the limit while x goes to 0;
lim[(1-cosx)/(x^2)]what is the limit while x goes to 0;
What are the conditions so the Rolle Theorem can be applied to fuction f;
If f:D->R, the point z of D is local extreme and f is differentiable at z, then f\'(z)=0.
